label.checkbox.newsletterConsent: I would like to receive occasional newsletter from Brightizen
label.checkbox.signUpConsent: By clicking Sign Up, I agree to Brightizen's Website terms, Privacy policy.
tour.buildALibrary.description: Bitizens can contribute to our open library, and they can give a review to a medium, and report any type of content that are not complying our learning and sharing spirit.
tour.buildALibrary.headline: Together building a curated media library
tour.explore.description: Whether you are to find a new book to read, choose a new video to get inspiration from or try to discover a hidden message from a piece of artwork, it is likely that the bright community has some hints to offer you
tour.explore.headline: Exploring new medium to learn from
tour.learnAndRetain.description: Gaining more knowledge is difficult, but retaining them is even more so. We built a system that allow you to save information you want to remember, link to associated content and smartly display them so you can refresh your memory every time you rehearse.
tour.learnAndRetain.headline: Learning and retaining new ideas systematically
tour.main.headline: Being a bitizen with a mindset of learning and sharing.
tour.share.description: Every medium has some interesting ideas. You have extracted these ideas, learned them, applied them, let's share it to others.
tour.share.headline: Sharing ideas, stories of the medium you are consuming
